events.message: The candidate has submitted their application for the software engineer position, providing a detailed resume and cover letter.
After reviewing the application, it was categorised under Engineering due to the experience in software development and relevant skills.
A recruiter specializing in technical positions has been assigned to the candidate to manage the next stages of the hiring process.
The recruiter conducted an initial screening call with the candidate to discuss their background and confirm technical competencies.
The candidate responded promptly, expressing enthusiasm about the role and readiness to proceed to the technical interview.
A technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate on May 5th to evaluate coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
The candidate completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating strong proficiency in software development and system design.
An HR interview has been arranged to discuss the candidateâ€™s fit within the company culture and to review benefits and policies.
The HR interview went well, with the candidate expressing alignment with the company values and expectations for the role.
An offer was proposed to the candidate including competitive salary and benefits aligned with the market standards for engineering roles.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and requested additional details about career development opportunities.
The candidate officially accepted the offer, confirming their start date and enthusiasm to join the engineering team.
The onboarding process has commenced with the candidate completing necessary paperwork and beginning orientation sessions.
The recruitment case is now closed as the candidate successfully joined the company and started their role as a software engineer.
